0: Not only did the receptionist check us in but upgraded us to a suite free of charge which was lovely
The conference organizers helped us get another room somebody had cancelled but we did not understand why they did not just charge us for the first night and kept our room
Good pool area with Jacuzi Sauna steam room are paid extras4
This hotel has everything you can expect of a 5star hotel in a major European city and at decent price
Excellent location in the center of the city with a bus stop just in front of the hotel although the taxi rates were so low to almost everywhere due to the good location
I had breakfast included in the room price and the spread was huge vegetarian items omelet bar asian foods a huge assortment of muesli yogurts meats and juices
The glasses of wine are huge and quite expensiveI had the Caesar salad with chicken and the salad was swimming in the Caesar dressing
Really good hotel for the price

great room with a view the rooms have a modern and comfortable felbathrom very well designed romywonderful breakfast spread staf very helpful and always with a smile definitely recommend god value for price
Good price compared to other comparable hotels
1: Even with status and willing to pay the surcharge I was not able to upgrade my room
Rooms were a little on the small side for the price but this was more than compensated by the comfortable beds and the great breakfast
I paid a couple of visits to the Spa which was looking as good as ever it is even nicer when the terrace next to the pool is open to lay on
There are pay movies and a very few of them are free
Whilst I am not a fan of some of these changes no longer providing fruit or a free movie we did receive a very good upgrade and welcome amenity of a 15 Euro account credit
Breakfast cost a whopping € 34 and was definitely not worth it

I also mentioned how we stayed in the other hotel in Nürnberg and the lady there mentioned she is n’t going to charge anything extra for me she noticed me herselfIn fact it always happens that the hotel tells us at the time of check in if they will charge anything extra or not
it ’s not a venue issue but venue charge additional amount
Other hotels are not charging for sauna and steam room
